document_data.name: Hurbold Duethkatha
document_data.mainbody: '''Hurbold Duethkatha''',<ref group="note">In the [[Baldur's Gate (novel)|''Baldur's Gate'' novelization]], Scar's name is Harold Loggerson. or '''Scar''', was a commander of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was a good friend of [[Eltan|Duke Eltan]] the founder of the Flaming Fist.
document_data.Activities:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Scar worked with [[Abdel Adrian]] to discover evidence that the [[Seven Suns]] was involved with the [[Iron Throne]]. At the same time he was investigating a series of disappearances that originated from the city's sewer tunnels.

Commander Scar was killed a short time later and his persona was taken over by one of the [[doppelganger]]s working for [[Sarevok Anchev]].
